insert into paichi.recipe
RECIPE_ID,
RECIPE_NAME,
RECIPE_IMG,
RECIPE_VIDEO,
CRAFT_ID, TASTE_ID,
USER_ID,
PEOPLE_NUMBER,
COOK_TIME,
PREPARATION_TIME,
POPULARITY,
DIFFICULTY,
INTRODUCTION,
COOKINGSKILL,
TIMESTAMP,
#{recipeId},
#{recipeName},
#{recipeImg},
#{recipeVideo},
#{craftId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tasteId, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{userId},
#{peopleNumber, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{cookTime, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{preparationTime, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{popularity, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{difficulty, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{introduction, jdbcType=CLOB},
#{cookingSkill},
#{timestamp},
mapper.select: select r.recipe_id as recipeId, r.recipe_name, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, r.recipe_img) as recipe_img, r.recipe_video, r.CRAFT_ID, r.TASTE_ID, r.USER_ID, r.people_number, r.cook_time, r.preparation_time, r.popularity, r.timestamp, r.difficulty, r.cookingskill, r.introduction, e.EFFECT_ID, e.EFFECT_NAME, rs.RECIPE_STEP_ID, rs.RECIPE_ID, rs.STEP_CONTENT, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, rs.STEP_IMG) as STEP_IMG, rs.STEP_NUMBER, u.USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, USER_ICON, USER_EMAIL, USER_SEX, USER_INTRODUCTION, BIRTH, CREATE_TIME, c.CRAFT_ID, c.CRAFT_NAME, t.TASTE_ID, TASTE_NAME, m.MATERIALS_ID, m.RECIPE_ID, m.MAIN_MATERIALS, m.MAIN_NUMBER, m.MATERIALS_FLAG, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, m.MATERIALSIMG) as MATERIALSIMG from paichi.recipe r left join paichi.recipe_effect re on r.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID left join paichi.effect e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join paichi.recipe_step rs on rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID left join paichi.user u on u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID left join paichi.craft c on c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID left join paichi.taste t on t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID left join paichi.materials m on m.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID where r.RECIPE_ID = #{recipeId} order by rs.STEP_NUMBER ASC

select t1.RECIPE_ID as recipeId, RECIPE_NAME as recipeName, RECIPE_IMG as recipeImg, POPULARITY as popularity, COOK_TIME as cookTime, TIMESTAMP as timestamp , stepNumber, userName, craftName, tasteName, effectName from ( select r.RECIPE_ID, r.RECIPE_NAME, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, r.RECIPE_IMG) as RECIPE_IMG, r.POPULARITY, r.COOK_TIME, r.TIMESTAMP, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from paichi.recipe_step rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from paichi.user u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from paichi.craft c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from paichi.taste t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from paichi.recipe_effect re left join paichi.effect e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join paichi.recipe r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID limit 1) as effectName from paichi.recipe r
and r.DIFFICULTY > 15
and r.DIFFICULTY > 12
and r.DIFFICULTY > 9
and r.DIFFICULTY > 6
and r.DIFFICULTY > 3
and (r.DIFFICULTY <=3 or r.DIFFICULTY IS NULL)
and r.COOK_TIME >= 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 1440 and r.COOK_TIME < 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 120 and r.COOK_TIME < 1440
and r.COOK_TIME >= 60 and r.COOK_TIME < 120
and r.COOK_TIME >= 0 and r.COOK_TIME < 60
and (r.COOK_TIME IS NULL or r.COOK_TIME < 0)
and r.CRAFT_ID = (select rc.CRAFT_ID from paichi.craft rc where rc.CRAFT_NAME = #{term.craftTerm})
and r.TASTE_ID = (select rt.TASTE_ID from paichi.taste rt where rt.TASTE_NAME = #{term.tasteTerm})
and EXISTS (select rm.RECIPE_ID from paichi.materials rm where rm.MAIN_MATERIALS = #{term.materialTerm} and rm.MATERIALS_FLAG = 1 and rm.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID)
order by r.TIMESTAMP DESC
order by r.POPULARITY DESC
) t1 limit #{page.currentNumber}, #{page.limit}

select count(*) from paichi.recipe r
and r.DIFFICULTY > 15
and r.DIFFICULTY > 12
and r.DIFFICULTY > 9
and r.DIFFICULTY > 6
and r.DIFFICULTY > 3
and (r.DIFFICULTY <=3 or r.DIFFICULTY IS NULL)
and r.COOK_TIME >= 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 1440 and r.COOK_TIME < 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 120 and r.COOK_TIME < 1440
and r.COOK_TIME >= 60 and r.COOK_TIME < 120
and r.COOK_TIME >= 0 and r.COOK_TIME < 60
and (r.COOK_TIME IS NULL or r.COOK_TIME < 0)
and r.CRAFT_ID = (select rc.CRAFT_ID from paichi.craft rc where rc.CRAFT_NAME = #{craftTerm})
and r.TASTE_ID = (select rt.TASTE_ID from paichi.taste rt where rt.TASTE_NAME = #{tasteTerm})
and EXISTS (select rm.RECIPE_ID from paichi.materials rm where rm.MAIN_MATERIALS = #{materialTerm} and rm.MATERIALS_FLAG = 1 and rm.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID)

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID as recipeId, r.RECIPE_NAME as recipeName, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, r.RECIPE_IMG) as recipeImg, r.POPULARITY as popularity, r.COOK_TIME as cookTime, r.TIMESTAMP as timestamp, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from paichi.recipe_step rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from paichi.user u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from paichi.craft c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from paichi.taste t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from paichi.recipe_effect re left join paichi.effect e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join paichi.recipe r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID limit 1) as effectName from paichi.recipe r ) t order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC limit 8

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID as recipeId, r.RECIPE_NAME as recipeName, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, r.RECIPE_IMG) as recipeImg, r.POPULARITY as popularity, r.COOK_TIME as cookTime, r.TIMESTAMP as timestamp, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from paichi.recipe_step rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from paichi.user u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from paichi.craft c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from paichi.taste t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from paichi.recipe_effect re left join paichi.effect e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join paichi.recipe r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID limit 1) as effectName from paichi.recipe r ) t order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC limit 8

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID as recipeId, r.RECIPE_NAME as recipeName, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, r.RECIPE_IMG) as recipeImg, r.POPULARITY as popularity, r.COOK_TIME as cookTime, r.TIMESTAMP as timestamp, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from paichi.recipe_step rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from paichi.user u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from paichi.craft c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from paichi.taste t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from paichi.recipe_effect re left join paichi.effect e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join paichi.recipe r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID limit 1) as effectName from paichi.recipe r ) t order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC limit 8

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID as recipeId, r.RECIPE_NAME as recipeName, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, r.RECIPE_IMG) as recipeImg, r.POPULARITY as popularity, r.COOK_TIME as cookTime, r.TIMESTAMP as timestamp, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from paichi.recipe_step rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from paichi.user u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from paichi.craft c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from paichi.taste t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from paichi.recipe_effect re left join paichi.effect e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join paichi.recipe r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID limit 1) as effectName from paichi.recipe r ) t order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC limit 8

select * from (select uo.USER_ID as userId, u.USER_NAME as userName, u.USER_ICON as userIcon, r.RECIPE_ID as recipeId, r.RECIPE_NAME as recipeName, concat(#{fastDFSPath}, r.RECIPE_IMG) as recipeImg, uo.LAST_UPDATE_DATE as timestamp , ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY uo.USER_ID order by uo.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC) as num, -- 食谱菜单总数 (select count(rr.USER_ORDERS_ID) from paichi.orders_recipe rr where rr.USER_ORDERS_ID = uo.USER_ORDERS_ID) as ordersCount from paichi.user_orders uo left join paichi.user u on u.USER_ID = uo.USER_ID left join paichi.orders_recipe oo on uo.USER_ORDERS_ID = oo.USER_ORDERS_ID left join paichi.recipe r on oo.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID order by uo.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC) uu where uu.num <= 5

select * from (select uo.USER_ID as userId, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY uo.USER_ID order by uo.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC) as num from paichi.user_orders uo left join paichi.user u on u.USER_ID = uo.USER_ID left join paichi.orders_recipe oo on uo.USER_ORDERS_ID = oo.USER_ORDERS_ID left join paichi.recipe r on oo.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) uu where uu.num <= 1
